short_summary: Re-tender F1571-230203 Paramount Building 25 - Foundation and Slab on Grade Construction
description: Construction for Foundation and Slab on Grade for Paramount Building 25
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: F1571-230203
### Re-tender Invitation for Foundation and Slab on Grade Construction

#### Project Details

*   Tender Reference Number: WS4098019308-Doc4252842397
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Solicitation Number: WS4098019308
*   Publication Date: October 10, 2023
*   Closing Date: November 7, 2023, at 14:00:00 hours (Eastern Time)
*   Amendment Date: November 3, 2023

#### Project Specifications

The re-tender invitation is for the construction of the foundation and slab on grade for the Paramount Building 25.

#### Contract Details

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contract Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada
*   End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
*   End User Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

#### Contact Information

*   Contact Person: Bryan, Kelly (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice and Attachments

*   Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17681930?extsite=MTc2ODE5MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17681930?extsite=MTc2ODE5MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   Attachments: None

*   Note: This tender is closed, and no further submissions can be made. The project details and specifications are included above.
 
 Recall that the firms are competing to win this contract. These winning firms will get to do the work of constructing  a foundation and slab on grade for Paramount Building.   
There will be services required to 
*   Earthmoving 
*   Foundation installation
